title: Omega Squad Veigar change.
body:
This is an awesome skin, I will start with that, and i love it no matter what, despite not being a huge Veigar player.
The eye changes on 'command 1' as well as on the corresponding CC is fantastic, no doubt about that! Props to the designers.

But I feel like its awesomeness is overshadowed by its ultimate.
The ult is a cool particle its true, and theres nothing wrong with it, except for the fact that no one wanted it.

From day 1, the top 3 highest voted comments on _literally_ every medium where the skin was featured was "please change the ult!"

No change.

Like really? What is the point even putting skins out on PBE for community testing, if when you get **overwhelming** feedback about it, you do nothing?

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
